tasks.label: audit: lint+type+verify
args: source .venv/bin/activate && set -euo pipefail; mkdir -p reports; ts=$(date -u +%Y%m%d_%H%M%SZ); ruff check . --fix | tee reports/ruff_fix_$ts.log; ruff check . | tee reports/ruff_after_$ts.log; mypy bb8_core | tee reports/mypy_$ts.log; python tools/verify_discovery.py | tee reports/verify_discovery_$ts.log; echo RECEIPTS: reports/ruff_after_$ts.log reports/mypy_$ts.log reports/verify_discovery_$ts.log
